title: Update Fail?
body:
Sooooo, i just tried to log onto league, and the patcher loaded to 33%, scanned 1 file, then showed a pop-up notice saying "Update Failed. Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information.

I would totally do that, but i have no idea how to, so I didn't bother messing something up and decided to ask the Rito Overlords instead.

plz help

replies.body:
Seems similar to my issue. To add some information, this seems related to wherever the NA patcher is pointing to. If I switch my client to EU W and restart the client, the client downloads the update just fine. But if I go back to NA, it stays stuck at 33%. It seems to be having issues resolving the full list of updates to compare to the local files.

[Here are some logs](http://pastebin.com/Sm2zcJyx)
It looks like there was a service incident with the patching service yesterday that has since been resolved. Let me know if you're still having issues with this.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dpZ3hOuI,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-10-09T18:08:43.267+0000)
>
> It looks like there was a service incident with the patching service yesterday that has since been resolved. Let me know if you're still having issues with this.

I still get the error, and I did everything that could've helped. Also when I re-install the game it loads up only to 98% then shows the error again. This is the first time I experience anything like that, the error first appeared when patch 6.20 came out. I know for sure it's not caused by my connection as I tried patching with firewall turned off, and I have no anti-viruses besides that.
people said it's the AVG virus software that are causing the trouble, I have AVG and it's denying my match to start. Even though I successfully copied an updated version from my LAPSTOP!!!

Yup I have this just now, I've searched for tips.
Tried changing servers and patching np but when I go back to NA, same error.
I uninstall, install, deleted everything but that is now working, I think there is 
something with NA server right now.
glad its not just me, i closed the client and am able to launch it now (it did pop up again however) just kinda hoping it wont cost me elo now.
Same thing for me -_- Riot, help, please :(
myself and 3 other are also having this problem.

1. Reboot
2. Open and close the client a couple of times

Worked for me
Guys, the riot gods have heard our cries, and bring us a solution we can all get behind. NEW THRESH SPLASH ART!!!! WOOOOOO. Splash art is the one true way! Thank you riot!
